content:
# The Stone Furnace confirms that it has produced 17 Copper Plates, but my inventory still does not reflect this amount. 
# This discrepancy indicates that the Copper Plates are currently stored in the Stone Furnace's output rather than in my player inventory.

# To resolve this, I need to extract the Copper Plates from the Stone Furnace into my inventory.
# I will extract all 17 Copper Plates from the Stone Furnace.

extract_item(Prototype.CopperPlate, position=stone_furnace_entity.position, quantity=17)  # Extracting 17 Copper Plates from the furnace.

# After this extraction, I will check my inventory again to confirm that the Copper Plates have been successfully transferred.
print(f"Inventory after extracting Copper Plates: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Checking inventory after extraction.
